item.title: By: Stuart Brogden
item.dc:creator: Stuart Brogden
item.description: I currently serve as a deacon in Grace family Baptist Church, where Voddie Baucham serves as one of our (three) elders. Before I attended GfBC, I asked the elders what they meant by the phrase, "family of families". It was explained to me then - and demonstrated to me weekly since joining the church - that the family is the means of discipleship. Parents - primarily fathers - are trained to lead their families. The church helps and supports members and their families as well as requires member's families to help and support them. It is the most family supportive church I've been a part of, yet clearly biblical, reformed, and Baptist in its structure and organization and operation. Not perfect by any shot, but God honoring in intent and effort. I am a joyful part of GfBC, as is my wife.
